ratings.comment: His classes were great, and he always made it easy to participate in class. He was very helpful in office hours and it seemed like he really cared about his students. If I were going to take another Spanish class in the future I would definitely look out for him.

Professor Larrea Quiroz was one of my favorite professors! Although I was not too fond of 226 because of the homework, he made lectures fun and had a great sense of humor. You can tell he cares about each of his students and genuinely wants to see them improve in their Spanish!

Enrique was great! He has high standards for his students writing but leaves great feedback and doesn't grade too harshly. He was super chill and really funny. There were definitely days that I wanted to skip class but he always made it worth my time. It was easy to participate in this class, even when I know I misspoke he never judged.
